name: 陳文學
objective: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
schedule:
第一週 Introduction
第二週 Power Electronic Systems
第三週 Power Electronics versus Linear Electronics
第四週 Overview of Power Semiconductor Switches
第五週 Semiconductor Switches – Diodes, Thyristors BJT, MOSFET, GTO, and IGBT
第六週 Review of Basic Electrical and Magnetic Circuit Concepts
第七週 Electric Circuits and Magnetic Circuits
第八週 Line-Frequency Diode Rectifiers: Line-Frequency AC → Uncontrolled DC
第九週 Midterm Exam.
第十週 Line-Frequency Phase-Controlled Rectifiers and Inverters: Line-Frequency AC → Controlled DC
第十一週 Single and Three-Phase Converters
第十二週 DC-DC Switch-Mode Converters
第十三週 Step-Down (Buck), Step-Up (Buck) and Buck-Boost Converters
第十四週 Switch-Mode dc-ac Inverters: DC → Sinusoidal AC
第十五週 Single and Three-Phase Inverters
第十六週 Resonant Converters: Zero-Voltage and/or Zero-Current Switching
第十七週 Classification of Resonant Converters
第十八週 Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
1.平時成績(課程參與及課堂表現) 10%
2.作業 10%
3.專題研究 20%
4.期中考 30%
5.期末考 30%
materials:
Textbook：
1. Handouts 
2. Power Electronics: Converters, Applications, and Design 3rd Edition
    Ned. Mohan, Tore. M. Undeland, William. P. Robbins; John Wiley & Sons, 2003

Reference Book：
1. Power Electronics Handbook: Devices, Circuits, and Applications, 3rd Ed.,
    Muhammad H Rashid; Butterworth-Heinemann, 2010
